posts.content:
Here goes...dont wont to sell though recent family addidtion leaves no time for me to complete a restoration. Its still got MOT for 18 days I doubt I will take it in for another. The van has no interior. Its RHD. It is not original. It has narrow 5s..dics on front. IRS rear to a type 3 auto box to a type 4 2.0 engine. Full length aftermarket sunroof and its got naff alloys. This will be a project obviously. The van overall is not a basket case. I doubt its one for the purist. Ive owned it for 18 months and ive had the engine rebuilt in that time. Re the engine its a porsche fan conversion on weber 36s. The engine bay has been restored with new Alan Schofield panels throughout. The van is 12 volts too with leisure facilities and night heater. I have no real idea its value. I can only go off sites. Is Â£11995 way off ? Ive not put the van on e bay. Its just on here for now. Welcome to view..im located NW.

VAN NO LONGER FOR SALE..APOLOGIES ALL.
Hi.. I will be in touch..cant do anything this weekend due to work and others viewing. The van wont go until all interested parties have viewed.

Hi Gents

Im pulling the ad on the van..its not been sold. Theres an issue with the rebuilt engine that I need ti resolve..following that I may as well MOT it to get the maximum gain. Apologies..it was unforseen
Regards.

Thank you for your interest

Darren.

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content: Get it sorted and keep it mate.
